instruction: Design a system to classify movie reviews as positive or negative
output:
A system to classify movie reviews as positive or negative can be designed as follows:

- Collect a corpus of movie reviews labeled with their sentiment 
- Train a classifier to classify reviews into one of two categories: positive or negative 
- Test the classifier on unseen reviews to assess its accuracy 
- Introduce scaling and regularization if needed to minimize the risk of overfitting 
- Deploy the classifier system and monitor its performance
